T02TD2383E:14b-1: sha ta aaksha ra bhtt'a ra ka sya sa tvam tree ya dh'a ba na /
T02TD2383E:14b-3: rje btsun yi ge brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bsgom pa'i thabs /
T02TD2383E:14b-4: bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2383E:14b-5: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi lam //
T02TD2383E:14b-6: dge ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
T02TD2383E:14b-7: sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2383E:14b-8: blo dman dang ldan sgrub brtson zhing //
T02TD2383E:14b-9: bla ma'i gdams ngag dang bral la //
T02TD2383E:14b-10: phan phyir sgrub thabs gsum bsres brtsam //
T02TD2383E:14b-11: aom shr'i badzra he ru ka sa ma ya /
T02TD2383E:14b-13: he ru ka tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:14b-15: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:14b-16: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:14b-19: tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga w'an /
T02TD2383E:14b-21: he ru ka badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:h'um phat /
T02TD2383E:14b-22: de la bsgom pa'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2383E:14b-23: rang snying dbus gur phra ba yi //
T02TD2383E:14b-24: h'um gi dkyil du mthe bo tshad //
T02TD2383E:14b-25: tam yig dkar 'od lta bu ni //
T02TD2383E:14b-26: de yi spyi bor gnas par bsam //
T02TD2383E:14b-27: h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer ni //
T02TD2383E:14b-28: ting 'dzin sems dpa'i snying ga yi //
T02TD2383E:14b-29: kha sbyor nam mkha'i dbus su ni //
T02TD2383E:14b-31: aom dang h'um gi sbyor ba las //
T02TD2383E:14b-32: padma rdo rje rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2383E:14b-33: aom ni du ba'i mdog lta bu //
T02TD2383E:14b-34: dam tshig sems dpa' shes par bya //
T02TD2383E:14b-35: de gnyis nye bar sbyor ba las //
T02TD2383E:14b-36: aa ni ye shes sems dpa' bsgom //
T02TD2383E:14b-37: rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa nyid //
T02TD2383E:14b-38: thig le'i ngo bo yi ge med //
T02TD2383E:14b-39: gnyis dang gnyis min zhi ba nyid //
T02TD2383E:14b-40: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
T02TD2383E:14b-41: 'di lta bu ni mgrin par bsgom //
T02TD2383E:14b-42: gnyis kyang 'od zer gcig la spro //
T02TD2383E:14b-43: du ba me khyer mar me'i nang //
T02TD2383E:14b-44: mkha' snang dang ni smig rgyu'o //
T02TD2383E:14b-45: kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer ni //
T02TD2383E:14b-46: dbang po'i gzhu 'dra'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2383E:14b-47: rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang //
T02TD2383E:14b-48: padma gar dbang rdo rje rgyal //
T02TD2383E:14b-49: rdor sems drug pa he ru ka / mgrin par bsdus te rnam par gnas //
T02TD2383E:14b-50: de ltar bla med rgyud rnams la //
T02TD2383E:14b-51: bsnyen pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyis ni //
T02TD2383E:14b-52: sgrub pa'i gdams ngag zhal gyi lung //
T02TD2383E:14b-53: rim pa ji bzhin bshad byas nas //
T02TD2383E:14b-54: da ni rnal 'byor rgyud bzhin du //
T02TD2383E:15a-2: rnal 'byor rgyud du dbang thob pa'i //
T02TD2383E:15a-3: shes rab ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2383E:15a-4: bde bar stan la 'dug byas la //
T02TD2383E:15a-5: aom a'a: h'um gi sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-6: gsum gyi don la 'di ltar brtsam //
T02TD2383E:15a-7: thog mar rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
T02TD2383E:15a-8: ting 'dzin rgyal bcas sna rtser lta //
T02TD2383E:15a-9: aom a'a:h'um ni brjod byas pas //
T02TD2383E:15a-10: gnas gsum du ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD2383E:15a-11: de nas so so'i kha dog gi /'od zer lcags kyu lta bu ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-12: spros pas sangs rgyas sras bcas rnams //
T02TD2383E:15a-13: mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drang zhing //
T02TD2383E:15a-14: de la lnga'am bdun pas mchod //
T02TD2383E:15a-15: gsum la skyabs 'gro la sogs bya //
T02TD2383E:15a-16: de nas sprin bral nam mkha' la //
T02TD2383E:15a-17: gnas pa'i skar ma lta bu ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-18: yig brgya'i sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02TD2383E:15a-19: aom shr'i badzra la sogs pa //
T02TD2383E:15a-20: de nas 'di lta'i sngags brjod bya //
T02TD2383E:15a-21: aom dang sva bh'a ba shuddha: //
T02TD2383E:15a-23: shuddho& ham zhes brjod byas pas //
T02TD2383E:15a-24: skar ma ltar gsal dag par bsam //
T02TD2383E:15a-26: dh'am dang ka ro mi brjod pas //
T02TD2383E:15a-27: de la nam mkhar h'um las ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-28: sna tshogs padma bsam par bya //
T02TD2383E:15a-29: de nas yi ge aom gyis ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-30: nam mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD2383E:15a-31: de yi steng du a'a brjod pas //
T02TD2383E:15a-32: rang nyid skar ma ltar gsal ba //
T02TD2383E:15a-33: zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsam //
T02TD2383E:15a-34: der rjes aom dang bo dhi tsita //
T02TD2383E:15a-35: ta dang au tp'a da y'a mi //
T02TD2383E:15a-36: brjod de rang nyid yi ge a'a //
T02TD2383E:15a-37: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD2383E:15a-38: de yi rang bzhin gsal ba yi //
T02TD2383E:15a-39: byang chub kyi ni sems yin pas //
T02TD2383E:15a-40: 'gro ba rnams la khyab byed cing //
T02TD2383E:15a-41: gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid bsam //
T02TD2383E:15a-42: de rjes gsum pa yi ge ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-43: ham zhes brjod pas spyi bo yi //
T02TD2383E:15a-44: tshangs pa'i bu gar h'um bsams la //
T02TD2383E:15a-45: de las byung ba'i rdo rje ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-46: rtse lnga pa ni rnam bsams te //
T02TD2383E:15a-47: brtan byed sngags 'di brjod par bya /
T02TD2383E:15a-48: aom dang ti shtha badzra h'um //
T02TD2383E:15a-49: de zhu ba las rdo rje sems //
T02TD2383E:15a-50: bdag nyid 'di yi rigs can ni //
T02TD2383E:15a-51: yin par yang ni rab bsams te //
T02TD2383E:15a-52: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar //
T02TD2383E:15a-53: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:15a-54: de la shr'i ni dpal gyi don //
T02TD2383E:15a-55: de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod //
T02TD2383E:15b-0: de ltar @15b aom gyi yi ge yis //
T02TD2383E:15b-1: dam tshig sems dpar rnam par bstan //
T02TD2383E:15b-2: yang na 'di ltar shes par bya //
T02TD2383E:15b-3: aom ni zla ba de ster du //
T02TD2383E:15b-4: h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02TD2383E:15b-5: de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la //
T02TD2383E:15b-6: dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2383E:15b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar //
T02TD2383E:15b-8: zhal phyag la sogs snga ma bzhin //
T02TD2383E:15b-9: de ni aom ste dam tshig sems //
T02TD2383E:15b-10: thog mar dge ba bkra shis pa'o //
T02TD2383E:15b-11: da ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2383E:15b-12: bsgom pa rnam par brtsam par bya //
T02TD2383E:15b-13: aom dang ya ta te ta th'a //
T02TD2383E:15b-14: ga ta ta th'a ham zhes pa //
T02TD2383E:15b-15: brjod pas mdun du h'um sngon bsam //
T02TD2383E:15b-16: de byung 'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs //
T02TD2383E:15b-17: de yi dbus byung rdo rje ni //
T02TD2383E:15b-18: rgya gram de dbus pam las kyang //
T02TD2383E:15b-20: de yi ge sar steng du ni //
T02TD2383E:15b-21: h'um byung rdo rje sems dpar bsam //
T02TD2383E:15b-22: de nas shar gyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD2383E:15b-23: tshangs yig dang po bris pa yi //
T02TD2383E:15b-24: m'a me munytsa'i sngags brjod pas //
T02TD2383E:15b-25: rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD2383E:15b-26: mi bskyod mgon po bsam par bya //
T02TD2383E:15b-27: rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD2383E:15b-30: no pa tishtha brjod pas so //
T02TD2383E:15b-31: aom dang dridho me bha ba //
T02TD2383E:15b-32: brjod pas rgyab dkyil pad 'dab la //
T02TD2383E:15b-33: sa bon las byung 'od dpag med //
T02TD2383E:15b-35: aom dang su toshyo me bha ba //
T02TD2383E:15b-36: brjod pas don grub sa bon las //
T02TD2383E:15b-37: me yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD2383E:15b-38: rnam snang yi ge dang bcas pa'i //
T02TD2383E:15b-39: aa nu rakto me bha ba //
T02TD2383E:15b-40: brjod pas rang gi sa bon las //
T02TD2383E:15b-41: rdo rje sems ma skud mdog dkar //
T02TD2383E:15b-42: zhal gcig spyan gnyis g-yon du gzigs //
T02TD2383E:15b-43: phyag gnyis dkur brten gtso dang mtshungs //
T02TD2383E:15b-44: g-yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje 'bar //
T02TD2383E:15b-45: bden brel aom dang su poshyo //
T02TD2383E:15b-46: me bha ba brjod rigs can ma //
T02TD2383E:15b-47: sa bon las byung sku mdog ser //
T02TD2383E:15b-48: phyag g-yon sngar bzhin g-yas pa yis //
T02TD2383E:15b-49: rin chen 'dzin cing g-yon du gzigs //
T02TD2383E:15b-51: pra yatstsha brjod chos ma dmar //
T02TD2383E:15b-52: g-yas bdag g-yon pa snga ma bzhin //
T02TD2383E:15b-53: g-yon du gzigs te dbang ldan du //
T02TD2383E:15b-54: rig byed tshig gi dang po dang /
T02TD2383E:15b-56: tsittam shre ya: ku ru brjod //
T02TD2383E:15b-57: sa bon las byung las ma ni //
T02TD2383E:15b-58: ljang ser sna tshogs rdo rje g-yas //
T02TD2383E:16a-2: yum bzhi'i dbu rgyan rigs kyi bdag / de rjes 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni //
T02TD2383E:16a-3: dbang ldan las brtsams g-yon skor du //
T02TD2383E:16a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs ba //
T02TD2383E:16a-5: sems dpa' bcu drug rim bzhin bskyed //
T02TD2383E:16a-6: h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD2383E:16a-7: bha ga b'a na badzra satva ni ;
T02TD2383E:16a-8: / kun la khyab par byed pa'i tshig / ma ni 'dren pa'i don yin te //
T02TD2383E:16a-9: me ni bdag tu rnam par bshad //
T02TD2383E:16a-11: de phyir bdag ni gzung la drangs //
T02TD2383E:16a-12: khyad par byung ba rdo rje sems //
T02TD2383E:16a-13: sku mdog ljang gu g-yon du gzigs //
T02TD2383E:16a-14: g-yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa ;
T02TD2383E:16a-15: / g-yon pa dril bu dkur brten te //
T02TD2383E:16a-17: dzr'a las rdo rje rgyal po ser //
T02TD2383E:16a-18: phyag g-yas rdo rje g-yon lcags kyu //
T02TD2383E:16a-19: kha cig g-yas pa lcags kyu ste //
T02TD2383E:16a-20: phyag g-yon dkur ni brten pa 'chad //
T02TD2383E:16a-21: sa byung chags pa sku mdog dmar //
T02TD2383E:16a-22: g-yas mda' g-yon ni gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2383E:16a-23: stvam las legs pa ma rgad mdog / skyabs sbyin g-yas la g-yon dkur brten //
T02TD2383E:16a-24: bha 'byung rdo rje rin chen ser //
T02TD2383E:16a-25: dbang bskur phreng ba gnyis kyis 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:16a-26: ga las rdo rje nyi ma dmar //
T02TD2383E:16a-27: snying gar phyag gnyis nyi ma 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:16a-28: b'a na las rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i mdog //
T02TD2383E:16a-29: yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni //
T02TD2383E:16a-31: ma byung bzhad pa sundha ri //
T02TD2383E:16a-32: mdog can rgyal mtshan so yi ni //
T02TD2383E:16a-34: h'a las chos ni dkar dmar mdog / g-yon gyi pad sdong g-yas kyis 'byed //
T02TD2383E:16a-35: sa byung rnon po gur gum mdog //
T02TD2383E:16a-36: phyag g-yon po ti g-yas ral gri //
T02TD2383E:16a-37: ma las byung ba'i rdo rje rgyu //
T02TD2383E:16a-38: sku mdog ser la chos 'chad rgya //
T02TD2383E:16a-39: ya las rdo rje 'od mdog dmar //
T02TD2383E:16a-40: g-yon du g-yas bas lce 'dzin pa //
T02TD2383E:16a-41: sa las rdo rje las ljang ser //
T02TD2383E:16a-42: phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa//
T02TD2383E:16a-43: gar stabs kyis ni spyi bor 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:16a-44: tva las bsrung ba sku mdog ser //
T02TD2383E:16a-45: gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:16a-46: tva byung rdo rje gnod sbyin nag / phyag gnyis kyis ni zhal phyogs su //
T02TD2383E:16a-48: aa las rdo rje khu tshur dkar //
T02TD2383E:16b-1: de ni h'um gi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2383E:16b-2: ting 'dzin sems dpar shes par bya //
T02TD2383E:16b-3: aa ni ye shes sems dpa' ste //
T02TD2383E:16b-4: de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya //
T02TD2383E:16b-5: phyag rgya snga ma la gnas nas //
T02TD2383E:16b-6: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las //
T02TD2383E:16b-7: 'od zer spro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2383E:16b-9: / sa ma ya ham zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2383E:16b-10: dam tshig sems dpar bdag nyid bsam //
T02TD2383E:16b-11: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2383E:16b-12: rang mdun nam mkhar zla dkyil la //
T02TD2383E:16b-13: gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dgug / yang ni sa ma ya stvam zhes //
T02TD2383E:16b-14: ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes phreng //
T02TD2383E:16b-15: de yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la //
T02TD2383E:16b-16: zla steng aa ni dkar po yi //
T02TD2383E:16b-17: ngo bor zhugs pa'i ye shes sems //
T02TD2383E:16b-18: bkug ste gtso bo'i thugs kar bstim //
T02TD2383E:16b-19: yang na phyag rgya snga ma yis //
T02TD2383E:16b-20: 'di lta'i rdo rje sems dpa' dgug / aa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ste //
T02TD2383E:16b-21: h'um ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02TD2383E:16b-22: de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la //
T02TD2383E:16b-23: aom ni ye shes sems dpa' ste //
T02TD2383E:16b-24: de nyid rdo rje sems dpar bshad //
T02TD2383E:16b-25: rtse mo bzhi la rigs bzhi ste //
T02TD2383E:16b-26: mtshams bzhir lha mo rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD2383E:16b-27: 'od kyi tshul du rnam par gnas //
T02TD2383E:16b-28: de nas zla ba rdo rje la //
T02TD2383E:16b-29: rdo rje h'um ni aom la ste //
T02TD2383E:16b-30: de la rtse bzhi'i 'od dbus la //
T02TD2383E:16b-31: mtshams kyang dbus la thim pa dang //
T02TD2383E:16b-32: de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' la //
T02TD2383E:16b-33: thim par gyur par rnam bsam bya //
T02TD2383E:16b-34: de ni dam tshig sems dpa' la //
T02TD2383E:16b-35: de yang gnyis med don du bshad //
T02TD2383E:16b-36: de rjes yi ge h'um gyur pas //
T02TD2383E:16b-37: rdo rje lce ni rdo rje yis //
T02TD2383E:16b-38: 'od der spro bar rnam bsam bya //
T02TD2383E:16b-39: de yis phyi nang dag byas nas //
T02TD2383E:16b-40: bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur te //
T02TD2383E:16b-41: de rjes bzlas pa ci nus bya //
T02TD2383E:16b-42: bzas pa'i rig pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD2383E:16b-43: aom shr'i badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD2383E:16b-45: badzra sa tva tve no pa tishtha /
T02TD2383E:16b-47: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:16b-48: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:16b-49: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:16b-52: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02TD2383E:16b-53: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na /
T02TD2383E:16b-56: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva aa:/
T02TD2383E:16b-57: des ni dam tshig bsrung bar gsungs //
T02TD2383E:16b-58: yi ge brgya pa btus pa yi //
T02TD2383E:16b-59: sgo nas sems dpa' gsum gyi don //
T02TD2383E:17a-0: sgrub thabs dge ba gsum ldan @17a * //
T02TD2383E:17a-2: / rnal 'byor rgyud dang mthun par bstan //
T02TD2383E:17a-3: da ni bya ba'i rgyud gsungs pa'i //
T02TD2383E:17a-4: sems dpa' gsum gyi sbyor ba brtsam //
T02TD2383E:17a-5: thog mar rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
T02TD2383E:17a-6: phung po lnga yi nga rgyal bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-7: de rjes sngags ni 'di ltar brjod //
T02TD2383E:17a-8: aom ma ni dha ri badzr'i ni /
T02TD2383E:17a-9: ma h'a pra ti sa re /
T02TD2383E:17a-10: raksha raksha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD2383E:17a-11: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom byas la //
T02TD2383E:17a-12: de rjes byams sogs dran byas nas //
T02TD2383E:17a-13: mdun du lam skyes gru bzhi ste //
T02TD2383E:17a-14: de dbus sna tshogs padma bsam //
T02TD2383E:17a-15: de steng aom las byung ba yi //
T02TD2383E:17a-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam //
T02TD2383E:17a-17: autpala phyag rgyas bkug pa yi //
T02TD2383E:17a-18: autpala rigs brgya bsam par bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-19: phyag rgya de ni dam tshig gi / sems dpar yang ni rnam par bshad //
T02TD2383E:17a-20: de rjes ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2383E:17a-21: sngags 'di yis ni dgug par bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-22: aom ae hye hi bha ga ba ti /
T02TD2383E:17a-23: pra s'a dha na tsa dha yam ku ru aa /
T02TD2383E:17a-25: aa tra sanni hi to bha ba /
T02TD2383E:17a-26: 'di brjod aa dku'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2383E:17a-27: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-28: da ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2383E:17a-29: sbyor ba 'di ltar shes par bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-30: aom bha ga ba ti sa ma ye shva ri sarba buddha ma te /
T02TD2383E:17a-31: t'a re aa dhi shtha n'a nytsa me ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2383E:17a-32: t'am yig h'um gis brgyan pa las //
T02TD2383E:17a-33: byung ba'i sgrol ma ljang gu ni //
T02TD2383E:17a-34: zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum ste //
T02TD2383E:17a-35: mi bskyod pa yi dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2383E:17a-36: rgyan rnams kyis ni legs par spras //
T02TD2383E:17a-37: g-yas zhal dkar la g-yon zhal gnag / g-yas gsum phyag mtshan rim par ni //
T02TD2383E:17a-38: mi 'jig sbyin dang mda' dang ni //
T02TD2383E:17a-39: rdo rje rtse lnga rnam par 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:17a-40: g-yon gsum rim bzhin sdigs mdzub dang //
T02TD2383E:17a-41: gzhu dang autpala shes par bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-42: sna tshogs padma'i steng du ni //
T02TD2383E:17a-43: padma'i stegs rgya'i bzhugs stabs kyis //
T02TD2383E:17a-44: mkha' lding lnga la brten pa'o //
T02TD2383E:17a-45: dbus kyi mkha' lding dkar po ste //
T02TD2383E:17a-46: lag pa gnyis kyis bum pa 'dzin //
T02TD2383E:17a-47: g-yas su nag dang ser po ste //
T02TD2383E:17a-48: g-yon pa ljang dang dmar po yang //
T02TD2383E:17a-49: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD2383E:17a-50: de ni ting 'dzin sems dpar bshad //
T02TD2383E:17a-51: rang lus la ni rnam dag don //
T02TD2383E:17a-52: yi ge gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2383E:17a-53: aom dkar spyi bo'i gtsug tu ste //
T02TD2383E:17b-0: mgrin @17b bar a'a: yig dmar po bsam //
T02TD2383E:17b-1: h'um nag snying ga'i padma ru //
T02TD2383E:17b-2: nga ltar rang lus rnam bsam bya //
T02TD2383E:17b-3: sa ben rnams la legs bskor ba'i //
T02TD2383E:17b-4: yi ge brgyab bzlas par bya //
T02TD2383E:17b-5: aom bha ga wa ti t'a re /
T02TD2383E:17b-6: sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02TD2383E:17b-7: t'a ra ka tve no pa tishta /
T02TD2383E:17b-9: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:17b-10: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:17b-11: su bo shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:17b-12: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha /
T02TD2383E:17b-14: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02TD2383E:17b-15: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga ba t'i badzra t'a re m'a me munytsa t'a ra /
T02TD2383E:17b-16: bha ga wa ti ma h'a sa ma ya sa tpa aa:/
T02TD2383E:17b-17: 'di ltar mi skyo'i bar du bzlas //
T02TD2383E:17b-18: smon lam rgya chen btab byas la //
T02TD2383E:17b-19: aom gatstsha stvam buddha bi sha yam pu na ra ga ma na yatstsha /
T02TD2383E:17b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba'i don ni /
T02TD2383E:17b-21: aom khyed ni sangs rgyas gnas su gshegs //
T02TD2383E:17b-22: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2383E:17b-24: h'um gis gdug cing dza: yis gshegs //
T02TD2383E:17b-25: bam gyis bcings shing ho: sa dgyes pa'o //
T02TD2383E:17b-26: de ltar bya ba'i rgyud la ni ;
T02TD2383E:17b-27: / brten pa'i sems dpa' gsum don bshad //
T02TD2383E:17b-28: da ni rgyu yi theg pa las //
T02TD2383E:17b-29: grags pa'i sems dpa'i don bshad bya //
T02TD2383E:17b-30: yang na gcig kyang ldan pas kyang //
T02TD2383E:17b-31: 'jig rten chos la blo ldog ste //
T02TD2383E:17b-32: rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD2383E:17b-33: bde bar stan la 'dug nas su //
T02TD2383E:17b-34: 'di ltar bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba brtsam //
T02TD2383E:17b-35: dang po mandala la sogs bsham //
T02TD2383E:17b-36: sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis //
T02TD2383E:17b-37: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02TD2383E:17b-38: skyabs kyi dam pa bla med pa'i //
T02TD2383E:17b-39: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2383E:17b-40: zhes brjod lus yid sbyor ldan bya //
T02TD2383E:17b-41: des ni byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2383E:17b-42: dge bsnyen du ni ming 'gyur te //
T02TD2383E:17b-43: de rjes byang chub sems bskyed de //
T02TD2383E:17b-44: bdag dang tha mi dad pa yi //
T02TD2383E:17b-45: byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02TD2383E:17b-46: btang snyoms kyang ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2383E:17b-47: de yi rjes la bla ma la //
T02TD2383E:17b-48: dang ba bskyed de dad pa bsgom //
T02TD2383E:17b-49: de ltar byas bas 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2383E:17b-51: bar chad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2383E:17b-52: gdams ngag don ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD2383E:17b-53: bsgom dang de bzhin bzlas pa'o //
T02TD2383E:17b-54: sgom don dang po ma la nas langs byas te //
T02TD2383E:17b-55: de rjes dkon mchog gsum ni rjes dran bya //
T02TD2383E:18a-2: rang gi lag mthil g-yon par aom las ni //
T02TD2383E:18a-3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de yi steng du hr'i: //
T02TD2383E:18a-4: de las byung ba'o ma'i mdog can gyi //
T02TD2383E:18a-5: bdud rtsi'i chu bsam aom hr'i: sv'a h'a yi //
T02TD2383E:18a-6: byin gyis brlab bya chu dang rang nyid la //
T02TD2383E:18a-7: dbang bskur tshul du sngags 'di brjod par bya //
T02TD2383E:18a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD2383E:18a-9: zhes bya'i sngags brjod spyi bor gtor //
T02TD2383E:18a-10: sgrub pa'i gnas la sogs la gtor bar bya //
T02TD2383E:18a-11: de rjes yig gsum gnas ni gsum du dgod //
T02TD2383E:18a-12: spyi bor tshangs pa'i yi ge dkar po ste //
T02TD2383E:18a-13: mgrin par ye shes yi ge a'a: dmar bsam //
T02TD2383E:18a-14: khro yig sngon po snying ga'i dbus su dgod //
T02TD2383E:18a-15: de ni sems dpa' rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD2383E:18a-16: de yi man ngag khro yig padma ste //
T02TD2383E:18a-17: aa ni zla ba rig byed dang bo'i tshig / bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa yin zhes bsam //
T02TD2383E:18a-18: de ni gnas gsum bsrung zhing dag pa'o //
T02TD2383E:18a-19: de rjes shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la //
T02TD2383E:18a-20: gser sogs snod du chu ni gtsang ma bltam //
T02TD2383E:18a-21: shar gyi phyogs su nam mkhar h'um yig bsam //
T02TD2383E:18a-22: de gyur las byung padma'i ge ser la //
T02TD2383E:18a-23: aa las zla ba de yi rigs skyes mtshon //
T02TD2383E:18a-24: de steng rnam snang yig gyur nyid dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2383E:18a-25: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur rnam par bsam //
T02TD2383E:18a-26: zla dbus bcom ldan sh'aka thub chos 'chad rgya //
T02TD2383E:18a-27: nyi 'od thub dang gnyis su med par bsam //
T02TD2383E:18a-28: de yi rjes la gsang sngags 'di brjod de //
T02TD2383E:18a-29: aom na mo ta th'a ga ta sya phat phat //
T02TD2383E:18a-32: me tog re blangs sngags re brjod byas pas //
T02TD2383E:18a-33: sngar bshams chu la nyi shu rtsa gcig dor //
T02TD2383E:18a-34: yang na rig pa de nyid brjod byas la //
T02TD2383E:18a-35: snga ma'i me tog re re blangs nas kyang //
T02TD2383E:18a-36: mandala la sogs sa phyogs gtsang mar ni //
T02TD2383E:18a-37: bcom ldan sh'akya thub la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2383E:18a-38: de rjes dpal ldan yi ge brgya pa ni //
T02TD2383E:18a-39: mi skyo'i yid kyis ci nus bzlas par bya //
T02TD2383E:18a-40: aom bha ga ba te mu ne ye sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02TD2383E:18a-41: sh'akya mu ne tve no ma tishtha /
T02TD2383E:18a-44: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:18a-45: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2383E:18a-48: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02TD2383E:18b-0: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na @18b sh'akya mu ne m'a me mu nytsa /
T02TD2383E:18b-2: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a:/
T02TD2383E:18b-3: de ni thog mar gti mug yi ge la //
T02TD2383E:18b-4: bar du sgra can tha mar dbyangs yig las //
T02TD2383E:18b-5: yi ge aa ste sems dpa' gsum du grags //
T02TD2383E:18b-6: de rjes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo byas te //
T02TD2383E:18b-7: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gshegs su gsol bar bya //
T02TD2383E:18b-8: rig gnas lnga la mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD2383E:18b-9: dpyad par rtogs dka' rdo rje 'chang gi dngos //
T02TD2383E:18b-10: rtsa ba'i grub chen l'u yi nas brgyud pa //
T02TD2383E:18b-11: gdams pa phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpa' gsum //
T02TD2383E:18b-12: sgrub thabs slob ma mchog gis gsol btab dor //
T02TD2383E:18b-13: bla ma'i gdams ba bum rgyun 'thungs lags pa //
T02TD2383E:18b-14: brtson shugs 'bar ba'i snying rjes sna drangs te //
T02TD2383E:18b-15: nyam chung gzung phyir rin chen phreng bar bsdebs //
T02TD2383E:18b-16: ji srid thub pa'i bstan pa gnas bar du //
T02TD2383E:18b-17: mtha' 'khob phyogs su dang zhing rgyas gyur cig / rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya ba'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bsgom pa'i thabs slob dpon n'a ro bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
